Color Picker Extension
Description: The Color Picker extension enables you to easily pick colors from any webpage by using the context menu. Once you click on the "Color Picker" option, the color picker mode activates. After selecting a color on the page, its hex code is automatically copied to your clipboard for easy use.

How to Use:
Activate the Color Picker:

Right-click anywhere on a webpage.
Select the Color Picker option from the context menu.
Pick a Color:

The cursor will change to a crosshair.
Click on the color you want to pick from the webpage.
Color Code Copied:

The hex code for the selected color is automatically copied to your clipboard.
You can now paste it wherever you need the color code.
This tool is perfect for designers and developers who need a quick and easy way to capture color codes from webpages!
